legal: API Terms of Service: Please link back (with follow, and without nofollow!) to the URL on Rise and mention Rise as a source, so we get traffic back from your site. If you do not we'll have to suspend API access.

jobs.title: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer, Growth
skills_suggest: 6+ years building complex web applications as a full-stack engineer
Strong proficiency with Ruby on Rails and React (TypeScript)
Solid SQL experience with MySQL or PostgreSQL
Frontend styling experience with CSS/SCSS and TailwindCSS
Experience building customer/consumer-facing features end-to-end
Comfort collaborating across product, design, and GTM teams
Experience with experimentation, analytics, and instrumentation

jobs.title: Airline Customer Service Agent SEA - English/Indian Speakers
skills_suggest: Fluency in Indian and English (required)
Strong interpersonal and communication skills
Accurate data entry and basic computer skills
Ability to remain calm and effective in a busy airport environment
Physical ability to stand and move throughout shifts
Availability for weekends, holidays, and morning shifts
Legal authorization to work in the U.S.; ability to pass background check and drug test

jobs.title: Senior Back-End Software Engineer, Infra
skills_suggest: Deep expertise in Ruby on Rails with infrastructure and architectural focus
Strong experience with relational databases (MySQL, Postgres)
Proven track record improving system performance, scalability, and reliability
Experience building internal tools, SDKs, or libraries for engineering teams
Familiarity with observability, monitoring, and performance optimization practices
Comfortable working autonomously in a fast-paced, fully remote environment
CEFR C2 / ILR 5 English proficiency

jobs.title: Lead Subject Matter Expert (Remote)
skills_suggest: Deep expertise in Zero Trust architecture and implementation
Active CISSP certification
Hands-on experience with identity federation and identity governance
Experience with micro-segmentation and network access control
Knowledge of NIST SP 800-207, NIST RMF, and OMB Zero Trust guidance
Experience integrating Zero Trust across cloud and on-prem platforms
Strong technical communication and stakeholder briefing skills

jobs.title: Remote Partner Manager - Principal
skills_suggest: Proven experience in co-selling with cloud partners and driving partner-sourced revenue
Strong knowledge of partner go-to-market models, field incentive programs, and cloud ecosystems
Excellent stakeholder management and executive communication skills
Ability to coordinate cross-functional teams including sales, marketing, and technical groups
Analytical skills to track pipeline and measure program impact
